mapper.select: SELECT dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiTaishoYSeireki" AS "dbT7021Jigyo_shukeiTaishoYSeireki", dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiTaishoM" AS "dbT7021Jigyo_shukeiTaishoM", dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiNo" AS "dbT7021Jigyo_shukeiNo" FROM rgdb."DbT7021JigyoHokokuTokeiData" AS dbT7021Jigyo WHERE dbT7021Jigyo."hokokuYSeireki" = #{報告年} AND dbT7021Jigyo."hokokuM" = #{報告月} AND dbT7021Jigyo."hyoNo" = '01' AND dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiNo" IN ('0200','0301','0302','0600','0702','0710','0720','0900','1002','1010','1020','1030','1040') GROUP BY dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiTaishoYSeireki", dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiTaishoM", dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiNo" ORDER BY dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiNo" DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiTaishoYSeireki" AS "dbT7021Jigyo_shukeiTaishoYSeireki", dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiTaishoM" AS "dbT7021Jigyo_shukeiTaishoM", dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiNo" AS "dbT7021Jigyo_shukeiNo" FROM rgdb."DbT7021JigyoHokokuTokeiData" AS dbT7021Jigyo WHERE dbT7021Jigyo."hokokuYSeireki" = #{報告年} AND dbT7021Jigyo."hokokuM" = #{報告月} AND dbT7021Jigyo."hyoNo" = '02' AND dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiNo" IN ( '0101','0102','0103','0104','0201','0202','0203','0204','0301','0302', '0303','0304','0401','0402','0403','0404','0105','0106','0205', '0206','0701','0702','0703','0704','0705','0706','0707' ) GROUP BY dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiTaishoYSeireki", dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiTaishoM", dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiNo" ORDER BY dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiNo" DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiTaishoYSeireki" AS "dbT7021Jigyo_shukeiTaishoYSeireki", dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiTaishoM" AS "dbT7021Jigyo_shukeiTaishoM", dbT7021Jigyo."hyoNo" AS "dbT7021Jigyo_hyoNo", dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiNo" AS "dbT7021Jigyo_shukeiNo" FROM rgdb."DbT7021JigyoHokokuTokeiData" AS dbT7021Jigyo WHERE dbT7021Jigyo."hokokuYSeireki"= #{報告年} AND dbT7021Jigyo."hokokuM" = #{報告月} AND ( ( dbT7021Jigyo."hyoNo" = '06' AND dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiNo" IN ('0101','0102','0103','0104','0201','0202','0203','0204', '0301','0302','0303','0304','0401','0402','0403','0404','0105', '0106','0205','0206','0701','0702','0703','0704','0705','0706','0707') ) OR ( dbT7021Jigyo."hyoNo" = '07' AND dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiNo" IN ('0801','0802','0803','0804','0805') ) ) GROUP BY dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiTaishoYSeireki", dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiTaishoM", dbT7021Jigyo."hyoNo", dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiNo" ORDER BY dbT7021Jigyo."hyoNo" DESC, dbT7021Jigyo."shukeiNo" DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT dbT7021Jigyo."hokokuYSeireki" AS "dbT7021Jigyo_hokokuYSeireki", dbT7021Jigyo."hokokuM" AS "dbT7021Jigyo_hokokuM" FROM rgdb."DbT7021JigyoHokokuTokeiData" AS dbT7021Jigyo GROUP BY dbT7021Jigyo."hokokuYSeireki", dbT7021Jigyo."hokokuM" ORDER BY dbT7021Jigyo."hokokuYSeireki" DESC, dbT7021Jigyo."hokokuM" DESC
